knowledge.content: Haryana is a state located in the northwestern part of India. It was carved out after the linguistic reorganisation of Punjab on 1 November 1966. knowledge.content: Haryana, state in north-central India. The city of Chandigarh, within the Chandigarh union territory, serves as the capital of that territory and also the states of Haryana and Punjab. Haryana was created in 1966 from the partition of the former state of Punjab into Punjabi-speaking Punjab and Hindi-speaking Haryana.
